Edited October 12, 2015 by tkw

Hi tkw.

Imgur is over capacity so I can only see the first pic, I don't recognize the issue though, can you please put your output_log.txt (it's in KSP_Data), settings.cfg (KSP folder) dxdiag (start, run, dxdiag, enter) and persistent.sfs (saves) on dropbox.com for me.
The parachutes are spamming the log with errors, please test a new save and new vessel.
i have a black parts texture and weird sun

Yes like I said, I have not seen the sun like that before, so I do not know the cause from memory.

If you have black textures it is likely your install is corrupt, please try reinstalling KSP.
